director.name: 吉里·哈夫尔卡 Jirí Havelka

introduction: An emotional, moving and sometimes amusingly absurd testimony of the human desire for family. Mr. and Mrs. Krása decide to resolve their childlessness with the help of a surrogate mother from Georgia. Their story shows that the path to having children of their own can sometimes be more than complicated. But if, along the way, people learn to be open with each other, generous and perhaps a little more understanding, they are in for the most beautiful gift life can bring.
